title: Samuel Stanley Scotty Snight
description: Meet Samuel Stanley Scotty Snight, a redheaded, freckle-faced, chubby second grader who loves to eat! From potatoes and steak to cookies and cake, he is passionate about mealtime. Unfortunately, good dental hygiene does not interest Samuel as much as satisfying his hunger. Samuel Stanley Scotty Snight will not brush his teeth at night, and consequences soon follow.
author: Alison T. Broderick
